name: Handmade Zippered Boxy Pouch - Goodnight Moon
description:
Practical is fun again with this multi-purpose zippered pouch.  Carry your cosmetics, hair accessories, pencils, or knitting needles (or whatever else you can think of) in style.  Made from a fun moon print by Heather Ross, the fabric is a sturdy linen.  The lining is in a lovely blue chambray.  Both ends have a twill tape tab, which makes zipping and un-zipping a breeze.

Measurements: 9 inches (23 cm) long, 3 inches (7.6 cm) tall

Please wash by hand, hang to dry.  Hot steam iron to press smooth.

name: Handmade Three-Season Scarf - Sweet Hungarian Paprika
description:
Introducing a beautiful tissue-weight scarf. This is made from 100% cotton voile and is light weight, allowing you to look fabulous without being weighed down. This scarf is not for the cold winds of winter, but will do handily through the chill of spring, the summer's evening, and the snap of fall. 

This versatile scarf is fully reversible.  It looks chic and hip paired with a jeans jacket, as well as looking sophisticated and refined with more formal attire. 

Measurements: Approximately 53 inches (134.5 cm) in length, 5 inches (13 cm) wide. 

Please hand wash. hang to dry, hot steam iron when needed.

name: Handmade Tomboy Billfold - Choose Your Fabrics
description:
I love a billfold; it's simple, it's compact, and it has a zipper, which I strangely adore! And now choose your own fabrics for something uniquely yours. 

This wallet is a lot like your boyfriend's only so much better. It has four sleeve pockets for your cards, a zippered pocket for change, and a long pocket for your paper money. Here in a perfectly girly blooming print by Michael Miller.

Measurments (when closed): 4 inches (10 cm) square.

Care: Hand wash or spot clean with mild detergent and warm water. Lay flat to dry. Press into shape with a hot steam iron. 

(Money and cards are not included!) 

DIRECTIONS FOR YOU: A portion of my huge fabric stash is pictured on my flickr page here: http://www.flickr.com/photos/bcharmer/sets/72157602559294421/ 

Go there and choose two fabrics that you'd like on your wallet. Then, purchase this listing and in the "Comments to Seller" portion of the checkout process, tell me which fabrics you've chosen, and which one you want on the outsde cover, and which one you'd like on the strap and lining. Questions? Contact me through Etsy or send me an e-mail: bcharmerdesigns [!at] yahoo.com

name: Handmade Zippered Pouch - Midnight Roses
description:
Practical is fun again with this multi-purpose zippered pouch.  Carry your cosmetics, hair accessories, pencils, or knitting needles (or whatever else you can think of) in style.  Made from a lovely and whimsical rose print by Heather Ross, the fabric is a sturdy linen.  The lining is in a lovely blue chambray.  Both ends have a twill tape tab, which makes zipping and un-zipping a breeze.

Measurements: 9 inches (23 cm) long, 3 inches (7.6 cm) tall

Please wash by hand, hang to dry.  Hot steam iron to press smooth.

name: Handmade Messenger/Diaper Bag - Made To Order
description:
This is a bag that I designed for myself when I couldn't find a diaper bag that was both great looking and organized enough for my needs. This one is basically the "everything but the kitchen sink" type of bag, but with style so that you look hip, not haggard. 

Featured are two pleated pockets on either end, two sleeve pockets on the back,three sleeve pockets under the flap and a big zippered pocket, also under the flap. Inside there are three sleeve pockets to organize your life. A swivel hook inside keeps your keys from the abyss.

This bag is fully interfaced for stability, and the strap is made from nylon "seat belt" webbing. It is made from Anna Maria Horner's beautiful home decor weight fabric as well as some sturdy canvas and ticking. Here's what I put in mine: a book, my journal, my daughter's diapers, a sippy cup, extra clothes, checkbook wallet, small card wallet, cell phone, ipod, keys, snacks, sunglasses, and whatever else I need for an outing. This bag holds more than you'll want to carry! The strap is adjustable so that you can wear it messanger style or over your shoulder. 

Measurements: 14 inches (35.5 cm)wide, 11.5 inches (29 cm) tall, and 5 inches (12.5 cm)deep.

This bag should be hand washed in warm water and hung to dry. Use a hot steam iron to press back into shape (but don't iron the strap, it will melt!).

Please allow 2 weeks for me to make your bag and get it in the mail.
